acf.title: Global Head of Operations and Middle Office
acf.bio_copy:
Chris Moran is Global Head of Operations and Middle Office and responsible for overseeing global portfolio valuations and trade processing. In addition, he is responsible for driving infrastructure strategy and platform delivery to all portfolio managers across the firm.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2013, Chris was with Nomura for 4 years, most recently as a Managing Director, Global Head of Fixed Income & Capital Markets Operations, where he was responsible for delivering end-to-end services, support and operations for sales, trading and Investment banking businesses. Before joining Nomura, Chris held various leadership roles at Merrill Lynch across both Operations and financial accounting. He began his career at Prudential Securities, where he held several positions in the fixed income operations groups.

Chris joined Millennium with 19 years of experience in Capital Markets Operations & Finance and has served as the SIFMA Operations Chairman of the Government Bond Market Association in 2008. He was also a member of the DTCC prime brokerage working group and the Bank of New York client advisory board.
